name: Diving Gel
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Attach
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. The gel attaches itself to the head face or gills of a creature. If the creature is Large or smaller and can breathe air it continues to breathe normally as the air-filled gel provides breathable air for the creature. If the creature can't breathe air it must hold its breath or begin to suffocate. If the gel is attached to a creature it has advantage on attack rolls vs. that creature. A creature including the target can take its action to detach the diving gel by succeeding on a DC 12 Str check.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.
